txt.en: You have placed the Malledhrim war-banner in a contested camp
You have defended the Malledhrim war-banner with honour
You were unable to defend the Malledhrim war-banner

There are many positions throughout Gathbúrz that remain contested by both sides of the conflict in Southern Mirkwood.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will fail on logout, make sure to turn in before you leave the game.</rgb>
You have abandoned the Malledhrim war-banner to the Enemy

'I have a challenge for you, [placeholder]: take this banner and plant it among the rabble down below and ensure that it stands proudly as a sign of our victory in Gathbúrz!\n\n'Let us see how many of those cowards will dare to take up the challenge, shall we?'
Contested camps can be found in Gathbúrz.\n\nRodelleth has asked you to place a Malledhrim war-banner at a contested camp.
'Proudly done, [placeholder]! We long ago taught the servants of the Enemy to fear the sign of the Malledhrim upon the field of battle, but I find that they need an occasional reminder of this.'
Defend the Malledhrim war-banner at the contested camp in Gathburz.
Rodelleth is at Thangúlhad in Gathbúrz.\n\nYou should return to Rodelleth with news of your success.
'Show the Orcs of Dol Guldur that we do not fear them...plant our banner and defend it against all foes, [placeholder]!'
'Show the Orcs of Dol Guldur that we do not fear them...plant our banner and defend it against all foes, [placeholder]!'
'Well done, [placeholder]...speak with Rodelleth, and she will reward you.'
Place a Malledhrim war-banner in a contested camp
